abstract: Slide will create an application with video from CBS, Hulu and others for use on Facebook. One problem: Why do people want to watch TV on Facebook?
snippet: Slide will create an application with video from CBS, Hulu and others for use on Facebook. One problem: Why do people want to watch TV on Facebook?
lead_paragraph: Not all distribution deals are created equally.

headline.main: Is Facebook Really Where You Go to Watch?
